verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:14
verses.text: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:15
verses.text: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:16
verses.text: Whose sisters were Zeruiah, and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:17
verses.text: And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmeelite.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:18
verses.text: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat children of Azubah his wife, and of Jerioth: her sons are these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:19
verses.text: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:20
verses.text: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
